---@class ProcessNodeBase
local ProcessNodeBase = SimpleClassUtil:class()
---@param tree ProcessTree
function ProcessNodeBase:initialize(tree,index,data)
   self._tree = tree
   self._index = index

   self._data = data
end

function ProcessNodeBase:getIndex()
  return  self._index
end

function ProcessNodeBase:onEnter()
   self:onStart()
   self:onUpdate()
end

function ProcessNodeBase:onLeave()
    self:onEnd()
   self._tree:onNext(self)
end

function ProcessNodeBase:onStart()
    Logger.error("onStart ## overwrite me !!")
end

function ProcessNodeBase:onUpdate()
    Logger.error("onUpdate ## overwrite me !!")
end
function ProcessNodeBase:onEnd()
    Logger.error("onEnd ## overwrite me !!")
end

return ProcessNodeBase
